Hello, this is very important, it's to tell you all not to open the attachm=
ent on an e-mail that looks like the following! This isn't a hoax, this is =
for real, and if the attachment is opened, your computer will get a virus. =
I got 6 of these already. Don't open the attachment! Repeat, whatever you d=
o, don't open it! I've pasted the message contents below.

Subject: [filena=
me (random)] 

Body: Hi! How are you? I send you this file in order to have=
 your advice 
or I hope you can help me with this file that I send 
or I ho=
pe you like the file that I sendo you 
or This is the file with the informa=
tion that you ask for 

See you later. Thanks 

--- the same message may be=
 received in Spanish ---

Hola como estas ? 

Te mando este archivo para qu=
e me des tu punto de vista 
or Espero me puedas ayudar con el archivo que t=
e mando 
or Espero te guste este archivo que te mando 
or Este es el archiv=
o con la informaci=F3n que me pediste 

Nos vemos pronto, gracias.


Don't =
open those e-mails attachments whatever you do! This isn't a joke...
